## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Desktop Application
Download the installer for your platform:

- **Windows**: [PrivacyThink_0.1.2_x64-setup.exe](https://github.com/Bilal140202/Privacythinkdoc/releases/download/v0.1.2/PrivacyThink_0.1.2_x64-setup.exe)
- **Mac**: Coming soon
- **Linux**: Coming soon

### System Requirements
- **OS**: Windows 10/11 64-bit
- **RAM**: 8GB minimum, 16GB recommended
- **Disk**: 5GB free space
- **CPU**: 2-core minimum, 4-core recommended

## ğŸ“ Release Notes

<!-- Add detailed release notes here -->

This release includes:
- Bundled Qwen 2.5 0.5B model
- Support for PDF, DOCX, and code files (65+ formats)
- Local RAG pipeline with SQLite vector storage
- Real-time performance monitoring
- Zero telemetry and offline capability

## ğŸ› Known Issues

- Mac and Linux versions not yet available
- Large models (7B+) require 16GB+ RAM
- OCR for scanned documents is experimental
